title: Power cut schedule for tomorrow released
body_lines: The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) says it has approved the request by the CEB for power cuts of 03 hours and 40 minutes for tomorrow (May 18).
Areas ABCDEFGHIJKLPQRSTUVW - 2 hours between 9.00 a.m. and 5.00 p.m. and 1 hour & 40 minutes between 5.00 p.m. and 10.00 p.m.
Demand Management Schedule  -18th May 2022 by Adaderana Online on Scribd
